sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He visits [[Winterfell]] to complain about the state of his holdfast and to request help rebuilding it in the coming winter. He annoys [[Prince]] [[Bran Stark]] by showing a lack of respect for [[King]] [[Robb Stark]]. [[Maester]] [[Luwin]] grants his request to get him to leave.<ref>"[[The North Remembers]]"</ref>
